# present(_:)

**Instance Method**

Converts the data from the image you specify into the braille map.

## Declaration

```swift
func present(_ image: CGImage)
```

## Parameters

- **image**: An image to convert into the braille map.

## Discussion

Use this method to convert image data into the braille map directly, without the need to modify the heights of individual pins using [doc://com.apple.Accessibility/documentation/Accessibility/AXBrailleMap/setHeight(_:at:)].
title: present(_:)
